item.description:
Those of us that live in the Boston area usually don't get to play tourist very often and actually "see" Boston.  Well, now is your chance.  Come party with the Beanstalks and show our out of town guests what Boston is all about.

Possible places to see include Paul Revere's House, The Old North Church, Boston Common, Quincy Market, Boston Harbor, Bunker Hill, The USS Constitution, Back Bay & Beacon Hill, Lexington & Concord, The Public Garden & the Swan Boats, and much more!

Optional trip into Boston Friday night for dinner and a comedy show (additional cost).

On Saturday multiple optional side tripes will be available.  Take a Duck boat tour through Boston and the Charles River, or go to Revere Beach for the sand castle building contest, or maybe walk the Freedom Trail.

Saturday night, back to the hotel for a great dinner and lots of dancing and partying.

Sign up for the full weekend package for only $165 - Hotel not included.

Must register with the hotel by June 29 to get the special rate of $95/night + tax. (regular price is over $200)  If you need help finding a roommate, talk to our Registrar, Susan.  She can also help you with partial packages.

See the flier on our website for more details. http://www.hubtall.org/events/flyers/2012_07_13-15--The%20Boston%20Baked%20Beanstalks%20Weekend.pdf
item.name: The Boston "Baked" Beanstalk Weekend
